content.text:
## Analysis of the Main Target Image

The target structure consists of a tower-like construction with the following characteristics:

- The structure has 4 distinct layers
- Bottom layer: Yellow rectangular base with two green rectangular blocks standing vertically on it
- Middle layer: Yellow rectangular block with two orange cylindrical blocks standing vertically on it
- Top layer: Yellow rectangular block with an orange triangular prism (roof-like shape) on top
- Total of 8 blocks used

### Spatial Relationships:
- Three horizontal yellow rectangular blocks are stacked with equal spacing between them
- Two green rectangular blocks are placed vertically on the bottom yellow base
- Two orange cylindrical blocks are placed vertically on the middle yellow block
- An orange triangular prism is placed on the top yellow block

## Selected Blocks from the Dictionary

Based on my analysis, I need the following blocks:

1. Green vertical rectangular blocks (block index 3) - 2 pieces
2. Yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (block index 6) - 3 pieces
3. Orange vertical cylindrical blocks (block index 9) - 2 pieces
4. Orange triangular prism (block index 14) - 1 piece

## Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 6
    Step2: Move block with index 3
    Step3: Move block with index 3
    Step4: Move block with index 6
    Step5: Move block with index 9
    Step6: Move block with index 9
    Step7: Move block with index 6
    Step8: Move block with index 14
}
```

This assembly order follows a bottom-to-top approach, starting with the base layer and progressing upward through each component of the structure.
